snippet: The C.E.O. of Goldman Sachs will be the Human Rights Campaign's first national corporate spokesman for same-sex marriage.
abstract: The C.E.O. of Goldman Sachs will be the Human Rights Campaign's first national corporate spokesman for same-sex marriage.
lead_paragraph: Lloyd Blankfein, the C.E.O. of Goldman Sachs, isn't popular, and he knows it. In 2009, after his freshly bailed out firm announced plans to award over $16 billion in bonuses, he said, "I could slit my wrists and people would cheer," which was obviously an exaggeration.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
